Totem.NAME: Totemic Call
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, restore #y2 HP or gain #y7 Block or gain #y1 Strength or Deal #y7 damage to a random enemy.

Totemicslam.NAME: Totemic Slam
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Totemic Call. NL At the start of your turn, choose a Totem Card. NL ( [E] is 0, Exhaust )

Lavashock.NAME: Lava Shock
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Overload card, reduce #b1 Overload. (Up to 5 cards per combat)

Omegamind.NAME: Omega Mind
DESCRIPTIONS: Restore 50% of the 10th single target attack card damage I use.
